      • renderToXml

        public static Document renderToXml(Framework fw,
                                   Renderer renderer,
                                   Parameters blockParameters,
                                   Parameters frameworkParameters,
                                   WindowState state,
                                   Class<?> baseClass)
                            throws FrameworkException
        Renders a Renderer into a new Document. This assumes that the renderer indeed produces XML. This is e.g. used to include blocks into editwizard task XML's.
        Throws:
        FrameworkException
